feed.title: Dodain
feed.subtitle: Dodain, Ebryx, InfoSec, Penetration Tester, Bsides Islamabad, Lead Security Engineer

entry.title: Challenging the OSCP, getting free exam (retake) & cracking it the smart way

link.title: Challenging the OSCP, getting free exam (retake) & cracking it the smart way

entry.summary:
TLDR; The mistakes done and lessons learned in my OSCP journey that I could not find in other blogs and getting a free exam retake. My two cents on the updated OSCP and how it can be cracked in a smart way. The (MX) is to highlight the mistakes I did.
Background: I had 4 years of pentest and red teaming experience at the time of taking the exam. I decided to start my OSCP journey in 2019, but ...
